title: Rational design of a g-C3N4/CdS/MIL-125 (Ti)-derived TiO2 ternary heterojunction as a highly efficient photocatalyst for wastewater treatment under visible-light irradiation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2889-2899
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00403E, Paper
Jiaqi Wang, Hongyang Huo, Guozhe Sui, Shuang Meng, Dongxuan Guo, Shanshan Fu, Dantong Zhang, Xue Yang, Jinlong Li
A highly efficient g-C3N4/CdS/TiO2 ternary heterojunction photocatalyst with a hollow structure has been fabricated using a step-by-step self-assembly strategy.
